result.relevanceClues: The episode revolves around the real estate industry and the efforts of three agents to sell properties.
In one of the scenes, Fredrik takes buyers on a Hudson River cruise to showcase his new development. This is related to travel, but only a small part of the episode is focused on it.
The episode is focused on the sale of houses, including a massive unit overlooking Central Park that Luis and a developer plan to create.
